alert.note: Alert for McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern McPherson County through 400 PM CDT... At 329 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marquette, or 7 miles west of Lindsborg, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lindsborg and Marquette. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
